sys_remote_update_set.description:
Requiero que se registre un CASE considerando para cada registro de desvinculaciones que provenga de SSFF
Considerar que este flujo ademas de usarse en la integracion, debera de estar disponible para crearle un formulario mas adelante

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_770fb6c897967d50655570700153af4c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sn_customerservice_case</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sn_customerservice_case">contact_type=integration^u_item_informationISEMPTY^EQ<item display_value="Integration" endquery="false" field="contact_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="integration"/><item endquery="false" field="u_item_information" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>DVT-Validate Item Information GBL</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	/*
	El primer caracter de worknotes pertenece a la siguiente descripci√≥n. Este es importante para obtener el item infpormation de acuerdo a la instutuci√≥n
	1 SALUD
	2 SORTEOS
	3 TECM
	4 TECMTY
	*/
	var brLog='DVT Desvinculacion: '+current.short_description+'\n';
	
    var institution= current.short_description;
	var inst=institution.charAt(0);
    var service= current.short_description;
	var serv=service.substring(1,3);
	current.short_description=current.short_description.substring(4);
    brLog+="SD: "+current.short_description+'\n';
    switch (inst) {
        case '1':
            institution = "SALUD";
            break;
        case '2':
            institution = "SORTEOS";
            break;
        case '3':
            institution = "TECM";
            break;
        case '4':
            institution = "TECMTY";
            break;
    }
    brLog+='institution: '+institution+'\n';
    var grQuery='u_displayLIKE'+institution+'^u_displayLIKE'+serv;
    var gr = new GlideRecord('u_item_information');
    gr.addEncodedQuery(grQuery);
    gr.query();
    if(gr.next()){
        brLog+='item information: '+gr.sys_id+'\n';
		current.u_item_information=gr.sys_id;
    }
	
	//gs.info(brLog);
	

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-30 18:32:34</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>770fb6c897967d50655570700153af4c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DVT-Validate Item Information GBL</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_770fb6c897967d50655570700153af4c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-30 19:17:27</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=770fb6c897967d50655570700153af4c"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_item_information</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="u_item_information">u_catalog_itemVALCHANGES^ORu_tenant=^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_catalog_item" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="u_tenant" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>DVT - Display Value</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    var catItem = current.u_catalog_item.getDisplayValue();
    var location = current.u_tenant.getDisplayValue();
	var service= current.u_service.getDisplayValue();
    var displayName = catItem;
    if (location != '') {
        displayName+=" - " + location;
    }
	displayName+=" - "+service;

    current.u_display = displayName;

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>francisco.bello</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-22 21:36:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cd0a8e1647efad10676de567436d431b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DVT - Display Value</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_cd0a8e1647efad10676de567436d431b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-25 17:57:20</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=cd0a8e1647efad10676de567436d431b"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_c231f64497567d50655570700153afe5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sn_customerservice_case</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sn_customerservice_case">contact_type=integration^EQ<item display_value="Integration" endquery="false" field="contact_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="integration"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>DVT-Validate Item Information</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	/*
	El primer caracter de worknotes pertenece a la siguiente descripci√≥n. Este es importante para obtener el item infpormation de acuerdo a la instutuci√≥n
	1 SALUD
	2 SORTEOS
	3 TECM
	4 TECMTY
	*/
	var brLog='DVT Desvinculacion: \n';
    var institution=previous.worknotes.charAt(0);
    var service= previous.worknotes.substring(1,3);
    brLog+=previous.worknotes+'\n';
    switch (institution) {
        case '1':
            institution = "SALUD";
            break;
        case '2':
            institution = "SORTEOS";
            break;
        case '3':
            institution = "TECM";
            break;
        case '4':
            institution = "TECMTY";
            break;
    }
    brLog+='institution: '+institution+'\n';
    var grQuery='u_displayLIKE'+institution+'^u_displayLIKE'+service;
    var gr = new GlideRecord('u_item_information');
    gr.addEncodedQuery(grQuery);
    gr.query();
    if(gr.next()){
        brLog+='item information: '+gr.sys_id+'\n';
		current.u_item_information=gr.sys_id;
    }
	//gs.info(brLog);
	gs.error(brLog);
	

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-30 17:35:55</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c231f64497567d50655570700153afe5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DVT-Validate Item Information</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c231f64497567d50655570700153afe5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-30 17:52:19</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c231f64497567d50655570700153afe5"/></record_update>
